translation.en: [announcer] And it's Rockin' With Dewey continuing to race in second.
translation.ja: ２番手につけたのはロッキン･ウィズ･デューイ

translation.en: Then comes Masherhal, Hand Over Bell and Perfect Alliance
translation.ja: NETFLIX プレゼンツ NETFLIX プレゼンツ 続くマーシャーホールとハンドオーバーベル 続くマーシャーホールとハンドオーバーベル NETFLIX オリジナル作品 続くマーシャーホールとハンドオーバーベル NETFLIX オリジナル作品

translation.en: is still at the back of the field in 56 and 3/5 seconds.
translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナル作品 後方から追うのは⸺ NETFLIX オリジナル作品 NETFLIX オリジナル作品 パーフェクト･アライアンス パーフェクト･アライアンス

translation.en: And now MF Happenstance leads the charge around the far turn.
translation.ja: コーナーを回り 先頭はＭＦハプンスタンス

translation.en: MF Happenstance, three quarters of a length.
Mystery Woman second on the outside,
translation.ja: ミステリー･ウーマン外から２番手に

translation.en: Rockin' With Dewey is third to the inside.
translation.ja: ロッキン･ウィズ･デューイ内に入り３番手

translation.en: And they're being followed by Hand Over Bell, Masherhal,
translation.ja: 続いてハンドオーバーベルマーシャーホール

translation.en: and Perfect Alliance is still at the back.
translation.ja: パーフェクト･アライアンスいまだ後方

translation.en: And they're into the stretch, three quarters in 1:24.2.
translation.ja: 最後の直線に入りますタイムは１分24秒２

translation.en: And it is still MF Happenstance,
translation.ja: 先頭 変わらずＭＦハプンスタンス

translation.en: and here comes Mystery Woman to the outside.
translation.ja: ミステリー･ウーマンが外から来た

translation.en: -And in the center, Hand Over Bell... -No.
translation.ja: 内からハンドオーバーベル

translation.en: Come on.
[announcer] It is Mystery Woman, Hand Over Bell on the far outside.
translation.ja: ミステリー･ウーマンが出たハンドオーバーベル外へ

translation.en: -Masherhal is closing late... -[man] Come on, Mashy.
translation.ja: 来い！ 来い マーシャー

translation.en: [announcer] Here at the finish it's Hand Over Bell!
-[man 2] Yeah, I got it. -Masherhal was next,
then came Rockin' With Dewey
translation.ja: ３着がロッキン･ウィズ･デューイ

translation.en: and Mystery Woman in 1:51.4.
translation.ja: ミステリー･ウーマンは１分51秒４でした

translation.en: I'm starting.
No, we wait for him.
Hello?
[computer] You have a collect call from the Atlantic County Correctional Facility
translation.ja: アトランティック郡の⸺ 刑務所からコレクトコールです

translation.en: -from... -[recorded voice] Darren.
translation.ja: 刑務所からコレクトコールです ダレンだ

translation.en: [computer] Press one to accept.
-Darren. -Hey.
-Where are you? -Jail.
translation.ja: どこにいる？ ムショだ

translation.en: Jesus. What did you do?
No, it's nothing. I've been trying to call you.
translation.ja: 大ごとじゃない お前の携帯 通じない

translation.en: You didn't pay your fuckin' cell phone?
translation.ja: お前の携帯 通じない

translation.en: Yeah, I get paid on Monday. What happened?
translation.ja: 滞納してる　何があった？

translation.en: -I'm down in Atlantic City. -Ma.
translation.ja: アトランティックシティで

translation.en: Just some asshole, I ended up having to smash in his window.
translation.ja: 窓ガラスを割ったら捕まった

translation.en: Misdemeanor. Point is, I'm stuck here. I gotta spend the night.
translation.ja: 拘留されて今日は帰れない

translation.en: Which is why I need you to help me out. I got this thing going on here tomorrow...
translation.ja: 〈明日 お前に頼みたい仕事がある〉

translation.en: so you gotta do it and pretend you're me.
You'll get in a guy's car and deliver a briefcase.
translation.ja: 〈ある男の車でカバンを運んでほしい〉

translation.en: [Darren] Don't worry about anything.
There's $1,500 in it for me. You know I need it.
translation.ja: 〈報酬は1500ドル金が必要なんだ〉

translation.en: All right? I'll be very proud of you.
-What's in the suitcase? -It's a briefcase.
translation.ja: スーツケース？ 書類カバンだ

translation.en: What's in the briefcase?
I don't know.
No, I'm not doing-- You don't know?
translation.ja: 知らない？そんな仕事 嫌だ

translation.en: It's just papers, man.
It's nothing major.
I'm not doing that.
-Put Ma on the phone. -No.
translation.ja: 母さんに代われ 嫌だ

translation.en: Danny!
-Put Ma on the phone. -[Ola speaking in Polish]
-[banging on door] -[conductor] Miss, I already told you, if you don't have a ticket you'll have to get off the train.
translation.ja: 乗車券がないなら降りてください

translation.en: Daniel... Your brother needs you. You're doing it.
translation.ja: 〈ダニエル兄さんを手伝いなさい〉

translation.en: [Darren] Okay, look, just listen, all right?
translation.ja: 〝メアチェン駅 〞 いいか よく聞け 〝メアチェン駅 〞

translation.en: There'll be a woman on a bench with a green purse.
translation.ja: 〈緑のバッグを持った女がベンチに座ってる〉

translation.en: And you swap your briefcase for hers.
-[Danny] Green purse. -You're not writing this down, are you?
translation.ja: 緑のバッグの… まさかメモしてないよな

translation.en: No.
Good. Don't be stupid, I really need this money.
translation.ja: 〈しくじるなよ俺はどうしても金が要る〉

translation.en: I owe you one, all right? I'll pay your cell phone bill.
translation.ja: お前の電話料金 払うからさ

translation.en: All right? She's got a green pocketbook and--
All right, but whose-- whose car am I getting into?
translation.ja: それで誰の車に乗るんだ？

translation.en: -What? -Wrap it up.
Just one sec. You just got to do this for me, okay?
translation.ja: もう少し 必ず行けよ

translation.en: I'm gonna do it. Who's the guy driving the car?
Promise me you'll do this. Danny? Promise me you'll do--
I'm doing it, but who's the guy driving the car?
translation.ja: だから⸺ 誰の車に乗るんだよ？

translation.en: You got a swipe? You got a swipe?
translation.ja: メトロカード貸して カード持ってる？

translation.en: [man] There's this one guy, like, from Philly, I think.
translation.ja: フィラデルフィア出身っぽい男が待ってる

translation.en: They got like a Philly vibe, and, uh... Russell and Jimmy know him.
translation.ja: ラッセルとジミーの知り合いらしい

translation.en: Russell's been a big pain in the ass, but Jimmy gets it, you know?
translation.ja: ラッセルはイラつく野郎だが⸺

translation.en: Like, he knows I can come through for him.
translation.ja: ジミーは俺の仕事ぶりを買ってる

translation.en: Shit's been weird since the bust, but this is a good situation 'cause these guys, they're professional.
translation.ja: 奴らはプロだから前みたいな失敗はないさ

translation.en: Not like Howie, that fuck. That guy doesn't know what he's doing.
translation.ja: ハウイのマヌケとは違う

translation.en: And the plan is intricate, you know what I mean? It's like a clock, you know.
translation.ja: 計画は綿密時計みたいに精巧だ

translation.en: Everything fits together and everyone gets protected.
translation.ja: 身の安全も保証されてる

translation.en: I want more money.
-No. -I'm driving.
translation.ja: ダメだ 運ぶのは私よ時計を動かす大役でしょ

translation.en: I'm keeping the clock running.
translation.ja: 運ぶのは私よ時計を動かす大役でしょ

translation.en: What are you talking about? You came to me for work.
translation.ja: 仕事があるだけマシだろ

translation.en: I mean, how'd you lose that job anyway?
translation.ja: ところで なぜ職を失った？

translation.en: Creative differences.
[chuckles] Really?
And how's, uh, Ricky's check cashing con paying off for you?
translation.ja: リッキーの詐欺商法は順調なのか？

translation.en: Because no one asked you to skip town to Pittsburgh for some greaseball shithead.
translation.ja: 奴のためにピッツバーグまで行くとはな

translation.en: Yeah, well, he did.
I mean, if you don't go back to Pittsburgh,
I have a... queen size bed.
translation.ja: うちのベッドはクイーンサイズだ

translation.en: You've done worse.
Well, I'm going back to Pittsburgh, so I'm fine on the couch, Scott.
translation.ja: スコット私はソファで大丈夫

translation.en: Just do the job.
This is the phone. Don't make any outgoing calls.
translation.ja: 連絡用に この携帯を使え

translation.en: And these are the keys to the Sentra.
translation.ja: 車の鍵だ　車種はセントラ

translation.en: -Thought you said it was an Altima. -It's a fuckin' Nissan. Doesn't matter.
translation.ja: アルティマじゃ？ どっちでもいいだろ日産車だ

translation.en: It's, like, uh, gonna be the only red Nissan on the block.
translation.ja: どっちでもいいだろ日産車だ あの通りには１台しかない

translation.en: -What's in the briefcase? -I don't know.
translation.ja: カバンの中は？ 知らねえよ

translation.en: You can't know everything, Ellie.
translation.ja: エリー　詮索するな

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta just do it.
translation.ja: 言われたことだけやれ

translation.en: Here you go.
Felicia, I can go?
Are you the guy?
Uh... yeah.
Yeah.
You the guy?
Yeah, I'm the girl.
Right.
I can see that.
Get in.
Do you know what the-- the-- the guy looks like?
translation.ja: どんな奴が来るか知ってる？

translation.en: No.
It is a guy, right?
Keep the car on. Roll this back window down.
translation.ja: エンジンは切るな窓を開けろ

translation.en: -[man shouting in distance] -He's coming back, he's coming back.
-Do you think they got the license plate? -I don't know.
translation.ja: ナンバープレートついてる？

translation.en: Because, man...
Do you know who the girl is I gotta meet with the green bag?
-Good luck. -All right.
Come on, man.
Yeah, it's done.
Oh, my God-- Oh, my God, it's you.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ ああ　会えてよかった

translation.en: You don't even know what I just did.
Look, stop. Where are you goin'?
translation.ja: どこ行くんだ？　待ってくれ

translation.en: Look-- Don't run, don't run, don't run, please don't run.
translation.ja: どこ行くんだ？　待ってくれ 頼む　逃げないで

translation.en: I just need a number or something, I just need...
translation.ja: どこに連絡すればいい？

translation.en: I don't know, an address or something, like...
translation.ja: 番号や住所とか知らないか？

translation.en: You're not gonna help me?
I just gave the briefcase to the wrong woman.
Exactly. What are we gonna do?
What am I gonna do? I'm not supposed to be here.
translation.ja: 俺は代理で来ただけだ

translation.en: I'm not even supposed to be here, it's my brother.
translation.ja: 兄貴の仕事だったんだよ

translation.en: -Do you know my brother Darren? -Don't fucking tell me his name.
translation.ja: 名前はダレン 聞きたくない

translation.en: Why don't you wanna know?
Look, look! Look, you're not gonna get your 1,500 either, okay?
translation.ja: 君だって 1500ドルもらえなくなるんだぜ

translation.en: -1,500? -Yeah, 1,500. That's all I know.
translation.ja: 1500ドル？ ああ　それが報酬だろ

translation.en: -All I know is the green-- -They're paying you fuckin' $1,500?
translation.ja: ああ　それが報酬だろ 1500ドル もらうの？

translation.en: I think so. I don't even know.
Give me your phone. Give me your fucking phone.
translation.ja: 携帯 貸して　早く！

translation.en: I don't have a-- I didn't pay my bill.
What are we gonna do?
You got a quarter?
I got a phone card. You gonna call him?
translation.ja: テレホンカードがある

translation.en: You're calling him?
-Fuck. -This is not fucking rocket science. How hard is it? You walk up to the fucking platform, -you exchange the suitcase. -I know.
translation.ja: 駅のホームに行くだけだ難しい仕事じゃない

translation.en: I got an eight-year-old that can do it.
You give it to this fuckin' Pollack, look what happens.
translation.ja: あのポーランド野郎はやめろと言った

translation.en: -You're so fucking stupid-- -Stop talking, Russell!
translation.ja: あのポーランド野郎はやめろと言った 黙れ ラッセルうるさいんだよ

translation.en: -Stop talking! -[cell phone ringing]
translation.ja: 黙れ ラッセルうるさいんだよ

translation.en: Hold up. Who's this?
-Well, hello there. -[man] I think we got a problem.
translation.ja: どうも しくじったな

translation.en: Yeah, no shit. $1,500, Scott?
Why is some idiot getting twice as much as me?
translation.ja: この男と私は倍も違う

translation.en: -[Scott] He with you now? -Yes.
translation.ja: 奴と一緒か？ そうよ

translation.en: Do you have the thing?
No.
But I have the address where it's going.
I think we got it under control, okay? Just gonna take a little longer.
It's fine. We got it under control.
It's gonna cost you.
[Scott] Okay. The full $1,500.
Twice that.
What the fuck do I care? It's comin' out of your share.
translation.ja: 俺に関係ない 奴をここに来させろ

translation.en: -Okay. -We need to see Darren, too.
And she brings Darren. I don't want him running around until this is done.
translation.ja: ダレンを逃がさず連れてこい

translation.en: Okay, so you deliver the thing and you bring him with you tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 ダレンを連れてブツを届けろ

translation.en: You can keep his share, too.
Okay. All right.
New Ebony Hotel, Room 1310, 10:00 p.m.
translation.ja: ニュー･エボニー･ホテルに午後10時

translation.en: 1310, got it. Let's go.
Wait, wait, you don't need me. You-- You got the address.
translation.ja: 俺は もう帰っていいだろ？

translation.en: Take the bag, I don't want it anymore.
What does the woman look like?
She's got blonde hair, she had a white shirt on.
translation.ja: 髪はブロンドで白いシャツ

translation.en: -She's... -Yeah, exactly. Let's go.
translation.ja: 髪はブロンドで白いシャツ 上出来　行こう

translation.en: [Ellie] What's the address on the pills again?
translation.ja: 薬の容器にある住所は？

translation.en: -[pills rattling] -31 Maryasis Road.
It's in Briarcliff.
[Ellie] Hi, what train goes to Briarcliff?
translation.ja: ブラークリフに行くには？

translation.en: Ossining or Scarborough, whichever one is closer to you.
translation.ja: オシニングかスカボロー行きの電車に

translation.en: -Scarborough. -12:20, track 40.
translation.ja: スカボローで 40番線　12時20分発です

translation.en: Okay. Thank you.
You want to guess what my name is?
translation.ja: 俺の名前 何だと思う？

translation.en: My name is Danny.
-Come on, tell me your name. -[scoffs] I'm not telling you my name.
translation.ja: ほら 君の番だ 教えない

translation.en: All right. Where are you from?
translation.ja: じゃあ どこから来たんだ？

translation.en: Look, you fucked up, so you lost "knowing shit" privileges, all right?
translation.ja: ヘマしたあんたに知る権利はない

translation.en: -You know, you can be a real-- -A what? Huh?
-A real bitch? -What?
translation.ja: 嫌な女？ まさか　違う

translation.en: No, no.
I was-- I was gonna say you can be a tough nut to crack, but...
translation.ja: 扱いにくいって言おうとした

translation.en: Were you really gonna say "a tough nut to crack"?
Yeah. Why, what's wrong with that?
I live in Pittsburgh.
translation.ja: ピッツバーグから来た

translation.en: How's Pittsburgh?
A lot of shitty people.
Oh. I'm sorry.
Don't be sorry. You didn't build it.
translation.ja: あんたのせいじゃない

translation.en: So, you live with anyone in Pittsburgh?
You know, you got a roommate or, you know, you got a boyfriend?
translation.ja: ルームメイトとか恋人とか

translation.en: I live with a Ricky.
What's a Ricky?
I had a lizard named Ricky once.
translation.ja: 飼ってたトカゲの名だ

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds about right.
Come on, you'll be done when it's done.
Who do you think lives out here?
Rich people.
So, how much do you think these houses cost?
translation.ja: 家の相場はどのくらいだと思う？

translation.en: -Why? You in the market? -Oh, no.
translation.ja: 買うの？ いや　まさか

translation.en: What about, uh, Sacramento? You ever been there?
translation.ja: サクラメントに行ったことある？

translation.en: No, thank God.
There's a job opening there.
'Cause I'm a chef, you know?
At a nice restaurant in the city.
You know what "farm to table" is, right?
translation.ja: 地元の食材を使ってさ

translation.en: I'm more of a cook, I guess.
Okay, sure, whatever, but you don't have to leave New York.
translation.ja: ニューヨークで十分じゃない？

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but...
my living situation's not great.
Fine, but there's restaurants everywhere.
translation.ja: でもレストランは多い

translation.en: That's true.
So what about you? What do you do?
-I'm recently unemployed. -Oh, really?
translation.ja: 最近 クビになったの どんな仕事をしてた？

translation.en: What did you do?
I-- I was a bartender.
But I made-- I made, like, fancy cocktails.
translation.ja: おしゃれなカクテルを作ってた

translation.en: That's cool. I got this friend Lev that I went to high school with,
translation.ja: すごいな高校の同級生にもいる

translation.en: he-- he's a bar-back in the city at this bar and he's just like...
translation.ja: バーテンダーの見習いをやってるんだ

translation.en: His favorite drink to make is, like, these egg whites--
Look, I wasn't a bartender, okay? I worked in a strip club.
translation.ja: ウソなのストリップクラブで働いてた

translation.en: All right. Okay.
I bet you were successful at that, you know.
-What the fuck's that supposed to mean? -Nothing, just 'cause--
translation.ja: どういう意味？ 深い意味はないきれいで頭がいいから…

translation.en: You're pretty and you're smart, and...
translation.ja: 深い意味はないきれいで頭がいいから…

translation.en: Well, I wasn't.
And I was only a waitress, okay? I didn't strip or work the back.
translation.ja: ウェートレスだったストリッパーじゃない

translation.en: -All right. -I'm serious. I don't sleep around.
translation.ja: 男と寝て稼いだりもしない

translation.en: -What, you don't believe me? -I believe you.
-Guess how many guys I've slept with. -It doesn't matter--
translation.ja: 何人と寝たか当てて やめよう

translation.en: -No, no. Guess. -I'm not guessing, that's stupid.
translation.ja: 言ってみて 嫌だ　くだらない

translation.en: -I'm not gonna guess. -Seven.
-Okay. -It's not a lot.
translation.ja: そうか 多くはない

translation.en: It's not a lot. I probably would've said higher.
translation.ja: もっと多いかと思った

translation.en: Oh, so you're saying I look like a whore now?
No! I just...
translation.ja: まさか　それは違う

translation.en: I just-- I wouldn't even think you were a whore if you slept with, like, a hundred guys.
translation.ja: 君が100人と付き合っても売春婦には見えない

translation.en: Yeah, exactly.
-Who are you to judge me? -I'm not judging you.
translation.ja: 見下してる？ してない

translation.en: That's why I don't wanna guess.
We're lost.
-Uh, we shouldn't be. -No, I've seen that house before.
translation.ja: まさか あの家 さっきも見た

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe you were here when you were a kid.
translation.ja: 子供の時来たことがあるのかも

translation.en: You know, if that was the right left, then this is Maryasis.
translation.ja: 方角的にここがマリアシスロードだ

translation.en: If they put up a fuckin' street sign we'd be able to tell.
translation.ja: 道の名前も書いてない

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -Looking for an address.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 住所を見る

translation.en: No, no, you can't do this, it's a federal crime.
Yeah, well, I got an accomplice.
Look, it is the right street.
Put it away.
Can I help you?
-Hey. Um, do you live here? -I do not.
translation.ja: どうも　この家の人？ 違うよ

translation.en: -Neither do we. -No.
translation.ja: 俺たちも違う キューティコフスさんには見えないな

translation.en: You don't look much like the Kutikoffs.
translation.ja: キューティコフスさんには見えないな

translation.en: The Kutiko-- Yeah, uh-- We're supposed to just, you know...
translation.ja: キューティコフス？ そう　俺たち 実を言うとあの…

translation.en: -They're-- We're just... -We're just a little lost.
translation.ja: そう　俺たち 実を言うとあの… 道に迷った

translation.en: -We're just a little lost. -That's it.
You know what I do when I'm lost? I call the police. Shall I call them for you?
translation.ja: 私なら警察を呼ぶね呼んでやろうか？

translation.en: -No, no. -No, thanks. We're just gonna leave.
translation.ja: 平気です もう行く

translation.en: -Thank you. -[man] Good idea.
translation.ja: ありがとう 行きなさい

translation.en: Sorry.
Don't worry about it. He's driving a fucking SUV.
-What does that mean? -He's an asshole.
translation.ja: だから？ 嫌な奴ってこと

translation.en: I don't think anyone's home.
Hey. It's in the living room. Don't let the dog out.
translation.ja: 居間にあるわ犬を出さないで

translation.en: Uh...
translation.ja: ええと… 彼女がバッグを持ってった？

translation.en: -Is that the girl that took the bag? -No, no. This girl is younger.
translation.ja: 彼女がバッグを持ってった？ あんなに若くない

translation.en: Uh, I guess.
I don't think she's talking about the briefcase.
I think we just have to find her and ask her.
translation.ja: 彼女を捜して聞いてみよう

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, let's do that.
translation.ja: そうね　それがいい

translation.en: Hello?
Hello?
Hey, look, it's a Ricky.
Oh, my God, check it out.
translation.ja: すごいな　ちょっと見せて

translation.en: That's a big lizard.
I don't know why they give kids pets that die so young.
translation.ja: 死んじゃうのになぜ飼うの？

translation.en: Maybe let 'em be sad about something small before the really sad things happen.
translation.ja: 悲しみに慣れる練習をするためかも

translation.en: Come on.
And, you know, lizards have a really long lifespan. Like, 20 years.
translation.ja: でもトカゲは長生きだ20年くらい生きる

translation.en: So what happened to Ricky?
Uh, well, his living situation wasn't exactly ideal either.
translation.ja: あの子は⸺ 俺と同じで 生活状態がよくなかった

Hello?

Hide. Hide.

Fuck.

Come on.

Okay.

translation.en: but think about it.

translation.ja: そいつ お前から離れようとしないだろ

translation.en: Why do you think she would do that?
You there, kid?
[in Polish] Yeah.
[Darren] Look, I'm sorry, Danny.
She's a con artist. Stripper.
translation.ja: その女は詐欺師でストリッパーだ

translation.en: [in Polish] Waitress.
[Darren, in English] Yeah, whatever, man. Point is, you're a fucking paycheck to her.
translation.ja: とにかく お前はただの小切手代わりなんだ

translation.en: But if you bring the briefcase back, then I can get the whole share and cut her out of it.
translation.ja: でも俺がカバンをもらえばそいつを出し抜ける

translation.en: Danny?
[in Polish] Just get the briefcase and come home.
All right?
[in Polish] Yeah.
[Ellie] You speak Russian?
Polish.
Then I figured out we were-- we were sneaking in at intermission.
translation.ja: 休憩中に忍び込むのもいいよね

translation.en: I don't know, I kind of preferred it that way, though.
What's wrong?
Nothing.
What?
-Come on, tell me what's up. -I got fired, all right?
translation.ja: 教えて クビになったんだ

translation.en: They called my mom.
Darren just told me. It doesn't matter.
I'm sorry.
I missed my shift, it happens. It doesn't matter.
translation.ja: 無断欠勤した俺が悪い仕方ないさ

translation.en: Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait. Listen.
translation.ja: ねえ　ちょっと聞いてくれる？

translation.en: I was thinking that when we get to the motel...
you should just wait nearby.
All right? Let me go up there alone and handle it. I got it.
translation.ja: 私が１人で届けてくる平気だから

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna call my manager, all right?
translation.ja: ちょっと店に電話するよ

translation.en: Okay? I just wanna see what she's saying. I don't wanna...
translation.ja: クビのことを確かめたい

translation.en: Just give me a minute?
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sure.
[man] Miss, you got a Metro card?
No. I just gotta get my bag.
-Danny. -Hey, Mom.
You didn't bring the--
You didn't bring the fucking briefcase?
translation.ja: 持ってこなかったのか？

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding me, Danny?
translation.ja: お前　どういうつもりだ

translation.en: [punching his palm] Are you fucking kidding me?
-It's fucking funny to you, man? -Yeah.
translation.ja: おかしいか？ まあね

translation.en: Scott.
[Scott] Ellie.
-Hey! I tried to call you. I tried to-- -Yeah, yeah.
translation.ja: 連絡しようとしたんだけど…

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
Hey.
Hey. Hey.
That girl...
She isn't gonna leave anybody.
Even if she thinks she is.
translation.ja: 自分はそのつもりでもな

translation.en: She isn't.
Trust me.
What did you say? Huh?
-What are you saying to me? -Fuck you.
translation.ja: はっきり言えよ “クソ野郎”

translation.en: That's what I'm saying.
-Russell, where are we going? -I don't know. To some rich lady.
translation.ja: どこに行くの？ 金持ちの女の所さ

translation.en: Ma! Leave it. Just leave it, okay? Leave it.
translation.ja: 危ないから手を出すな ダメだって

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -[speaking in Polish]
Ma.
[woman] Come in.
Come in. You can-- You can put that down.
Right there.
Very good.
Sit.
You wanna know the combination?
Zero-zero-zero.
It's about the only thing these guys did that wasn't Byzantine in its complexity.
translation.ja: 今回の計画で唯一シンプルなのが この番号よ

translation.en: [gasps] But you know how some men are.
They think the more intricate they make something, the more impressive it is.
translation.ja: やたらと複雑にしたがる男も多いけどね

translation.en: Ah, there you are.
The one thing the lawyer said I couldn't get.
translation.ja: 弁護士に諦めろと言われたわ

translation.en: And I got it.
[sighs] I want to tell you something:
translation.ja: いいことを教えてあげる

translation.en: Never marry a man who doesn't love his mother.
translation.ja: 母親を大事にしない男はダメ

translation.en: There's $3,000 in that envelope.
translation.ja: 封筒に3000ドル入ってるわ

translation.en: Thank you.
You can-- You can leave.
And I'll let Jimmy know it's done so everyone else can get paid.
translation.ja: みんなにも報酬を渡すと伝えるわ

translation.en: Okay.
[Russell] So where we going?
Not today. We're not open.
-[knock at door] -We're just-- We're gonna--
[Ola] Who are you?
I'm, uh...
-I'm Rebecca Vargas. -[mother] Rebecca Vargas?
translation.ja: レベッカ･バーガスです レベッカ？

translation.en: -Yeah? -[mother speaking in Polish]
Yeah, we went to high school together, Ma. You don't remember?
translation.ja: 高校の同級生だよ 母さん

translation.en: Hey.
Don't spend it all at the club.
Take it. And don't give it to your brother.
translation.ja: お兄さんに渡しちゃダメ

translation.en: So where are you gonna go?
Bus to Pittsburgh.
translation.ja: バスでピッツバーグへ

translation.en: Yeah?
I thought you said you were gonna leave there.
I am.
I just...
-I... -[scoffs]
-I owe it to him. -Yeah.
Right.
Just wait.
Just wait.
You know, you know, you don't... You need a Metro card.
translation.ja: メトロカード持ってないだろ？

translation.en: I-- I think I can buy one.
You can't because you only have hundreds
translation.ja: でも今は100ドル札しかないだろ

translation.en: and those machines are crappy and-- and I wanna give you...
translation.ja: でも今は100ドル札しかないだろ 券売機はボロいから⸺

translation.en: my Metro card.
Thanks.
...two, three, four, five.
Ma, Ma.
Sir, sir, I'll give you $100-- 100 for your card.

translation.en: Whoa. How do I know that's not counterfeit?
It's not.
Give me a swipe, give me a swipe. -One swipe. -One swipe.

translation.en: Thanks.
Hi. When's the next bus to Pittsburgh?
Uh... 6:40 p.m. The ticket is $57.
translation.ja: 午後６時40分発で料金は57ドルです

translation.en: -[woman] Miss? -Yeah, uh-- never mind, actually.
translation.ja: どうします？ やっぱり やめるわ

translation.en: When's the next bus to Providence?
Sorry! Sorry, sorry! Sorry.
Hey! Hey!
I-- I didn't think you...
[panting] Look. Look.
I was gonna go and I-- and I just-- I just ran all the way here.

translation.en: What's going on?
Look...
I want to go to Pittsburgh with you.
translation.ja: 俺もピッツバーグに行く

translation.en: I'm not going to Pittsburgh.
Well, where you going?
Providence.
Yeah?
Can I come with you?
Yeah. Sure.
Yeah?
-Yeah. -Yeah?
Wait.
-I'm sorry, okay? I shouldn't have-- -It's okay.
-It's okay. -No, no, I shouldn't have done that.
translation.ja: いいの いや ダメだ本当にごめん

translation.en: I shouldn't have done that. I'm sorry, I just...
translation.ja: いや ダメだ本当にごめん

translation.en: -Look, I apologize, okay? -Don't be. Don't-- Don't be sorry.
translation.ja: いや ダメだ本当にごめん 謝らないで私は ただ…

translation.en: I just didn't...
translation.ja: 謝らないで私は ただ… 何て言っていいか…

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Do you still wanna come?
Yeah.
Yeah, I still wanna come.
Okay, good.
And about the kiss... it's not that I...

translation.en: I just don't...
It's a start. -Okay? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 私たち 今から始めない？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
Yeah. I'll take a start.
translation.ja: 俺も ここから始める

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
